content.description:
A pla netary rover travels on a flat surface. The path of the rover for the time interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGimaiabgs MiJkaadshacqGHKjYOcaaIYaaaaa@3BCF@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> hours is shown in the rectangular coordinate system above. The rover starts at the point with coordinates (6,5) at time t = 0. The coordinates (x(t), y(t)) of the position of the rover change at rates given by

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mn>12</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>2</mn> <msup> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabmiEayaafa GaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0IaaGymaiaaikdaciGG ZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaGGOaGaaGOmaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaik daaaGccaGGPaaaaa@4394@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>y</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>10</mn> <mi>cos</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>+</mo> <msqrt> <mi>t</mi> </msqrt> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>,</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabmyEayaafa GaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaGymaiaaicdaciGGJbGaai4B aiaacohacaGGOaGaaGymaiabgUcaRmaakaaabaGaamiDaaWcbeaaki aacMcacaGGSaaaaa@4364@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

where x(t) and y(t) are measured in meters and t is measured in hours.
content.question: Find the total distance that the rover travels over the time interval <math> <semantics> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaaIWa GaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaigdaaeaaaaaa@3BD5@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions
